name: FS22 Peecon Biga Mega Mammoet
description:
RELEASE!!

Here is a large mixer wagon for you cattle feeding needs.
This is a re-work of the Peecon from fs17 that I have given a make over and brought to FS22 standards, with custom dirt and wear maps, and modern decals done by RAND0Msparks.

Its much better than it ever has been, but its still a relatively simple model.

Enjoy it
